note: I really don't know how to best identify myself in a bio. I feel like I change everyday. Professionally, I am a web developer, but I don't talk about it much. I love art of all kinds - poetry, writing, painting, drawing, videogames, and movies. I sometimes write or draw, but I'm far from talented in those efforts. There is a lot of stuff I care about - climate, inclusion, accessibility, and kindness. Sometimes I feel unable to help the world, but I try my best.
